name: Sunlight ScanLibrary 2 File
summary: Learn about .SSL2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SSL2 files are created by ScanLibrary, the light fixture editing program included with Sunlite Suite.

A lighting show can include several different types of fixtures. This allows stage and lighting professionals to create customized light shows for entertainment venues. Nicolaudie, the developers of Sunlite Suite, provide a library of SSL2 files available on their website.
NOTE: The SSL2 format replaced Nicolaudie's previous .SSL format. SSL files can be converted to SSL2 files using Sunlite Suite 2.

description: Settings file created by Sunlite Suite, an application suite used for staging and controlling computerized lighting systems; describes a light fixture and includes the geometry, movement, number of channels, lamp power, light emission shapes (gobo), and other properties for the light fixture.
